sentences.english: I want to daydream about have a big house with a big swimming pool and hurst motte wood.
sentences.chinese: 我想有一个很大的房子和很大的游泳池，树林。

sentences.english: Brand new wide sliding door leads you to the cozy back yard with pool and fruit trees.
sentences.chinese: 全新的大滑门带你到后院的舒适游泳池，还有果树。

sentences.english: Neither the Concorde nor the Napoléon has a swimming pool.
sentences.chinese: 协和和拿破仑饭店都没有游泳池。

sentences.english: Exspecially the swimming pool, how can it be so relaxing?
sentences.chinese: 特别是这个游泳池，气氛怎么可以这么放松呢？

sentences.english: The swimming pool will be roofed over in October this year.
sentences.chinese: 游泳池将于今年十月加盖屋顶。

sentences.english: In this example of swimming pool wall the conditions for performing corrosion rate measurements were not ideal.
sentences.chinese: 案例里的游泳池池壁的腐蚀速率测试环境不理想。

sentences.english: My assistants were hanging over the edge of the pool with plugged-in strobes .
sentences.chinese: 我的助手们拿着插入式电源闸挤在游泳池边上。

sentences.english: It is crowned by a rooftop terrace with an outdoor saltwater swimming pool.
sentences.chinese: 整个套房由带有海水游泳池的天台环绕。

sentences.english: Community laundry, pool and rec room .
sentences.chinese: 社区洗衣房，游泳池和娱乐室。

sentences.english: Each cabin has a large eucalyptus globulus wood beds and swimming pools.
sentences.chinese: 每间小屋都有桉木的大床和游泳池。

sentences.english: In Iceland, many of the buildings and even swimming pools are heated with geothermal hot water.
sentences.chinese: 在冰岛，许多大楼甚至游泳池都是由地热水供热。

sentences.english: The swimming pool is in-door heated.
sentences.chinese: 我们这里是恒温游泳池。

sentences.english: The savant foolishly took the school cooling pool because swimming pond.
sentences.chinese: 壆者愚蠢的把壆校的冷却池当成游泳池。

sentences.english: Cloth it rops into the swimming pool, NongJiu up by arrive in time.
sentences.chinese: 布不慎掉入游泳池中，被及时赶到的农救起。

sentences.english: The swimming pool is filled up with mud.
The building is equipped with a gymnasium and a swimming-pool.
sentences.chinese: 这个建筑物配备了体育馆和游泳池。
